description: This file defines a Zustand store named 'useGraphStore' for managing graph-related state in a web application. It includes state variables for nodes, edges, selection, and customization, as well as methods to modify these states such as adding, updating, removing nodes and edges, and registering custom node and edge types. It also provides functions to set the entire graph, select elements, and toggle read-only mode.

methods.name: id()
methods.description: Fallback ID generator function that uses nanoid if available, otherwise creates a random string.
